name: Sausage and Apple Breakfast Casserole
author: JimmyDean
summary: Sweet, spicy apple chunks, sausage, and Cheddar cheese add loads of flavor to this egg and bread cube casserole that's perfect for brunch.
ingredients: 2 large Golden Delicious apples, peeled, chopped
1 (9.6 ounce) package Jimmy Dean® Original Hearty Pork Sausage Crumbles
directions: Toss apples with sugar and cinnamon; set aside
Beat eggs, milk and vanilla in large bowl with wire whisk until well blended
Add bread cubes, sausage and 1 1/2 cups cheese and apple mixture; stir gently until evenly coated
Spoon into lightly greased 13x9-inch baking dish; top with remaining 1/2 cup cheese
Bake 40-45 minutes or until knife inserted in center comes out clean
Let stand 10 minutes before cutting into 12 squares to serve
